narrative.narrative: Twin Jet is an airline based at Marseille and has another base at Metz-Nancy. It began in May 2001 with charters and in March 2002 with scheduled flights. At March 2015 it was going to 9 other domestic airports besides the bases and to Basel-Mulhouse on the Swiss/French border and to Milan Malpensa,Italy and Stuttgart,Germany. From Marseille it serves 8 flights a day to Metz-Nancy,and Basel-Mulhouse,Geneva,Pau and Milan. From Metz it does 4 flights to Toulouse. From Paris Orly it does 2 flights a day to Perigueux,Bergerac and Limoges. From Nice it does 2 a week to Limoges and Milan. From Tolouse it also does 2 a day to Milan. Starting September 2014 it is doing Lyon to Stuttgart twice a day. At August 2011 its fleet had 10 Beechcraft 1900D's. It uses the Flying Blue frequent flyer program of the Air France/KLM Group.
